headline: Huntington Ingalls (HII) Stock Trades Up, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of aerospace and defense company Huntington Ingalls (NYSE:HII) jumped 9.1% in the morning session after it reported strong third-quarter results that surpassed Wall Street expectations. Revenue grew 16.1% year on year to $3.19 billion, beating analysts' forecasts. Earnings per share were $3.68, also outperforming predictions and showing a significant increase from the $2.56 reported a year earlier. Adding to the positive sentiment, Huntington Ingalls's backlog of future work grew 12.7% ov

headline: Huntington Ingalls (NYSE:HII) Reports Upbeat Q3, Stock Soars
summary: Aerospace and defense company Huntington Ingalls (NYSE:HII) reported revenue ahead of Wall Streets expectations in Q3 CY2025, with sales up 16.1% year on year to $3.19 billion. Its GAAP profit of $3.68 per share was 9.4% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Huntington Ingalls (HII) Tops Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Huntington Ingalls (HII) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +11.85% and +8.44%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: HII Reports Third Quarter 2025 Results
summary: NEWPORT NEWS, Va., Oct. 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII (NYSE: HII) today reported results for the third quarter of fiscal 2025.
